arts.ttl: Conference League | Fiorentina 3-2 Pafos: Match Report
arts.sum: Fiorentina secured a crucial 3-2 victory against Pafos in the UEFA Conference League, marking an important return to form for the team. Goals from Christian Kouamé, an own goal by Goldar, and a strike from Lucas Martínez Quarta propelled the Viola to victory, bringing them closer to the knockout stages of the tournament. After suffering a defeat in Nicosia, Fiorentina needed this win to regain confidence. The match at the Stadio Artemio Franchi saw the home side take control early on, with Kouamé scoring his first goal of the season. arts.ttl: Juventus, Torino, Bologna, and Lille Interested in Fiorentina’s Parisi
arts.sum: As the January transfer window approaches, Fiorentina may be considering the sale of left-back Fabiano Parisi, who has caught the attention of several clubs, including Juventus, Torino, Bologna, and even Lille from France. DAZN journalist Orazio Accomando reports how Parisi, who has emerged as a promising talent since his arrival at Fiorentina from Empoli, has found himself in a competitive situation with established players like Robin Gosens and Cristiano Biraghi occupying the left-back position. This has limited his playing time, making him a candidate for a potential transfer. The interest from Juventus is particularly notable as they seek to bolster The post Juventus, Torino, Bologna, and Lille Interested in Fiorentina’s Parisi appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Palladino’s pursuit: Fiorentina’s bold move for Daniel Maldini
arts.sum: Fiorentina are making a serious push to acquire Daniel Maldini, aiming to outmaneuver stiff competition from other Italian clubs. Calciomercato report how the initiative comes directly from manager Raffaele Palladino, who has a high regard for the talented son of Paolo Maldini. Palladino, having previously worked with Daniel, is credited as the coach who best understood, developed, and improved the young player’s abilities. The Viola’s management is intensifying efforts to reach an agreement with Maldini’s agent, Beppe Riso, with a view towards a summer transfer. Maldini’s contract with Monza includes two release clauses that can only be activated during the The post Palladino’s pursuit: Fiorentina’s bold move for Daniel Maldini appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: De Gea is 34 but making saves like he's 20 and helping Fiorentina mount a title challenge
arts.sum: De Gea is the best-performing keeper in the Italian league and, again, had a crucial part to play on Sunday at Como where, with his team 1-0 up, he pulled off an extraordinary triple save in the second half. Few people put Fiorentina among the Serie A title contenders this season, and fewer thought veteran goalkeeper David De Gea could be on course for another trophy after a year away from soccer.

arts.ttl: Conference League | Fiorentina v Pafos: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Fiorentina are gearing up for their upcoming UEFA Conference League match with a nearly full-strength squad. The recent return of Danilo Cataldi has bolstered the team’s options, leaving only midfielder Amir Richardson and captain Cristiano Biraghi as potential absentees. Albert Gudmundsson is expected to be available, pending his successful recovery from a thigh injury. Manager Raffaele Palladino is likely to rotate his squad for this European fixture, differing from his usual Serie A lineup. This rotation may see top scorer Moise Kean, who has impressively netted 12 goals in 15 appearances since his move from Juventus, given a rest.
